productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Upon receiving the chrome book... I was setting it up and kept getting distracted by the surface / keyboard. The faceplate and keyboard keys were warped and not flush. They were wavy like bacon staring around key 9 and so on. Also the face plate where the left USB ugs in is bulging at the face plate . It seems all the guts of this device have shifted or improperly placed. I sent it in for return and keep receiving conflicting  return information  and refund amounts. I want my full refund of $330.  Not 30% or $111. It has yet to.post to my account is.  The device its self is massive and has lots of ports and mini USB drive as well as 2 USB and 2 charger ports for data xfer or what not. The screen is large and nice and the keyboard  is NOT back lit. But it does have 10 key. Its just to bad it had a bad factory defect and they are trying to jerk me around with my return. I just had major shoulder  surgery  and am not in the mood.

json.description: Elevate your gaming adventure with the Acer Nitro V 15, your gateway to an adrenaline-charged journey. This laptop is the perfect blend of power and style, pushing the boundaries of whatâ€™s possible on a laptop. Powered by a 13th Gen Intel Core processor and NVIDIA GeForce RTX 40-series graphics and showcasing a crystal-clear 15.6â€ Full HD display with a 144Hz IPS panel - you can see why the Nitro V 15 is a knockout hit for gamers of every level. (NH.QN8AA.003)
features: Beyond Performance: Empower your gaming and creativity with the Nitro V 15, combining an Intel Core i7-13620H processor with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 Laptop GPU

More Games. More Fun. Windows is the GOAT of gaming. We have more game titles than any other OS. Windows has more triple-A game titles than any other OS, play popular releases solo or with friends â€“ because you know victory is sweeter when its shared.

Power That Plays Harder. Windows offers more games titles you can't get on a Mac. Designed for speed, impressive app performance - we have the power, graphics, and memory to keep your head in the game.

Can Your Mac Do This? Level up your game with Game Bar, and more. Immerse yourself in vivid worlds and experience impressive realism and framerates with DirectX 12 Ultimate running natively - so every detail moves with you.
Unlock 3 months of Game Pass. Play hundreds of PC games on your new Acer Nitro with 3 months of PC Game Pass.

AI-Driven Graphics: Experience gaming at its zenith with the NVIDIA GeForce RTX 4050 laptop graphics (194 AI TOPS for advanced AI). Dive deep into lifelike visuals and unparalleled performance, all amplified by DLSS 3 technology. Harness AI-driven advancements for smoother, more immersive gameplay that keeps you at the edge of your seat.

Picture-Perfect. Furiously Fast: See your digital conquests unfold in vibrant Full HD on a 15.6" screen, perfectly timed at a quick 144Hz refresh rate and a wide 16:9 aspect ratio providing 82.64% screen-to-body ratio. Now you can land those reflexive shots with pinpoint accuracy and minimal ghosting. It's like having a portal to the gaming universe right on your lap.

Thunderbolt 4: With the powerful Thunderbolt 4 port, you have the trifecta of power charging and data transfer with bidirectional movement and video display in one interface. | Stay Connected: Your gaming sanctuary is wherever you are. On the couch? Settle in with fast and stable Wi-Fi 6. Gaming Cafe? Get an edge online with Gigabit Ethernet. No matter your location, Nitro V 15 ensures you're always in the driver's seat.

Customize Performance with NitroSense: Monitor internal temperatures, adjust fan speeds, and fine-tune performance settings to ensure your laptop stays cool and efficient during gameplay or while multitasking.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the laptop performs well, with solid build quality and good value for money as an excellent investment for gamers and power users. The graphics quality receives positive feedback for its vibrant colors, and the SSD provides quick boot times. While some customers report the laptop runs games at high rates and stays cool during long gaming sessions, others find it sluggish and complain about overheating issues. Additionally, the battery life receives mixed reviews, with some finding it decent while others report it failing within a month, and customers note that the fans can get quite loud.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Iâ€™m very well-versed with the computer industry and products there in, I have done extensive research trying to find the perfect laptop for my daughter at a great bargain. Thereâ€™s always a phenomenal deal out there, although they are rare to come by and this is one of those. When I say I got this from my daughter, I donâ€™t mean to downplay it at all because I would get it for myself, although I have a high-performance laptop already, which I also got a phenomenal bargain on. This laptops processor is incredible as is the graphics card. These two together really offer a very high-end laptop. This is a brand new laptop and for the price of these products, Iâ€™m just blown away because if you do your research, youâ€™ll see that this is easily about 25% below market value for all the specs in this laptop. I would suggest only one thing as mandatory and thatâ€™s buying a micro USB memory stick because this has 512 GB. You can buy a 1TB cheap. I might, at some point increase the ram up to 32 GB for her, but that is not necessary at all as 16 GB that it comes with is perfect. But just because Iâ€™m saying that Iâ€™m gonna do these very minor add-ons does not mean you need to do anything to this laptop at all because it is 100% perfect as it is.You have to be very careful when buying laptops online because some are way overpriced and they mix the hardware up to where you might have a good processor but a real crappy graphics card or vice versa. This laptop is perfect. I give it a 10 out of 10 for its incredible bargain. If you want a great laptop that offers you some of the top tier hardware for a mid tier pricing and this is perfect for you I mean, who wouldnâ€™t want that. Iâ€™m not sure how they can offer such phenomenal deals because the rest of the market would have this laptop easily between $1000 on average up to $1200 on the high side. Laptop is priced at $799 currently and itâ€™s brand new not refurbished, which is just amazing.I searched for 2.5 months to find the perfect laptop and this was it.I will definitely edit this through time if anything pops up with issues or anything. We got it set up and sheâ€™s been using it for about four days now playing games online and streaming live while playing music so this thing handles large loads seamlessly.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on February 23, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: So far, for price and time I have had it, runs well. Plays games like halo infinite smoothly even with our spotty internet. Streams well. I use it to game with my husband and my certifications. Has great speed and the casing is so nice and sleek. Slight weight. The battery is actually pretty good for a laptop. My Toshiba was about the same, depends on what you're doing to how long the battery lasts. My certification, it lasts for about 4 hrs or so, for gaming, about an hr. I have had laptops with better batteries and ones with worse. It does everything I need and more. Going to invest in portable storage.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: After looking over the specs, reviews, and the price, I was really excited to receive my new laptop in the mail. Iâ€™ve bought Acer Nitro through Amazon before with excellent results, so I expected this to be a seamless transaction as usualâ€¦Battery was dead on arrival, or at least thatâ€™s what we could deduct since it wouldnâ€™t turn on/light up on the side to indicate the battery was charging. ðŸ™ƒðŸ¥²The laptop box itself had been shoved into a larger box with only some wrinkled paper to serve as â€œpaddingâ€, and I could feel the box inside slide all around the very second I picked it upâ€¦ canâ€™t say this is what led to the laptop being unable to turn on and charge, but it certainly put a pit in my stomach of worry before I even opened the packageâ€”we all know how rough mail can be handled through transit after all.The charger itself worked fine, and even powered my older Acer Nitro model without issues, but zero luck with the new laptop. Using a different charger on the Nitro V 15 also yielded no positive results.Currently processing the return + refund, which has been a headache and a half that I donâ€™t even wanna get into right now, as I wait for a new order of this model to be shippedâ€¦ and pray to all the deities and spirits imaginable that it isnâ€™t a repeat of the first one.Will update review once the new order arrives, currently scheduled for a Friday delivery. ðŸ¤žðŸ¼
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Worth it! All you need to know basically.
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This is one of the best options for a cheaper gaming laptop you'll find, it can run any game you want to play, I'm playing oblivion remaster and the sons of the forest sons of the forest can run high to ultra graphics, oblivion can run high settings with little frame drops so tweak it a little but it can run that's the good thing any modern game should be able to run high or higher, a TIP people complain about it getting hot go into your nitro sense which you can find my searching in your search bar, whenever you play demanding games set your nitro sense to performance mode and turn your fan up to a pretty high setting, I don't do the highest setting because I don't want to wear the fans down too quickly, moniter your PC during gameplay to make sure the fans are actually keeping it cool, if your computer is hot and won't cool down then close the game turn your fans up to the max and wait for the computer to cool off then start the game with the fans on high speed, unplug your computer when you're done with it and make sure it's powered off completely the goal is to perserve it's longevity especially cheaper laptops. It sounds good the audio can get loud, built in ai assistant, the screen isn't too small it's just right in my opinion. The storage is really the only big issue you can't have too many big games and having to constantly delete games is annoying but that's to be expected at this price level. It came with free gamepass for a month, malware bytes and some good antivirus software for free for the first month.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2025

productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewTitle: Alto rendimiento por bajo precio. INCREIBLE pero...
productPageReviewsFromOtherCountries.reviewDescription: Estoy enamoradisimo de esta Laptop, es mi primera laptop gaming y es increÃ­ble, no me arrepiento para nada.Me salio a muy buen precio en el Prime Day, No la he podido utilizar aun para estudios universitarios, pero si para modelado 3D, DiseÃ±o grÃ¡fico, Gaming y mÃ¡s, y jamÃ¡s me ha ido mal.Ventajas:Potabilidad: La laptop es muy ligera, te la puedes llevar en mano sin problema y no consume mucho espacio.Ventiladores: Los ventiladores son altamente customizables en la app que viene por defecto, puedes hacerlos o muy silenciosos o muy ruidosos, tambiÃ©n puedes hacerlos automÃ¡ticos o crear tu propia configuraciÃ³n. TambiÃ©n puedes hacer que se active ciertas funciones cada que entras a ciertas apps. Pero lo que mÃ¡s me impresiona que puedo jugar cosas exigentes y la laptop apenas y se va a calentar poquito. (Igual en todo caso, recomiendo comprar una base para levantar la laptop y que entre aire, o una base enfriadora, pero esto ya es decisiÃ³n personal).Tarjeta grÃ¡fica nvidia y Drivers: esta laptop no decepciona, puedes hacer grabaciones, transmitir, tomar capturas, etc. Los drivers tambiÃ©n se mantienen muy actualizados y cada cierto tiempo hay actualizaciones de sistema, lo que va bastante bien.Gaming: Esta laptop corre de todo, Puedo jugar Fortnite en Direct 12 en altos grÃ¡ficos sin ningÃºn problema y aun asÃ­ manteniendo la laptop frÃ­a. Resident Evil 4 y Cyberpunk sin problema pero... recomiendo mantener el ventilador en una configuraciÃ³n rÃ¡pida, porque estos juegos si calientan la laptop, pero igual tu puedes correrlos sin ningÃºn problema y con grÃ¡ficos alusinantes. Claro, que recomiendo variar las configuraciones para una mejor experiencia.Desventajas:Bateria: no te va a durar mÃ¡s de 2 horas sin estar enchufada; a no ser que lo tengas en un plan de bajo consumo, con ventiladores bajos y usando apps poco demandantes. Pero igual no te va a durar mucho la baterÃ­a, la vas a tener que tener conectada para casi todo.Teclado e idioma de sistema: el sistema esta en ingles; es fÃ¡cil de cambiar; el teclado es Estado Unidense; no contiene Ã‘ y solo brilla de color blanco, me hubiera gustado de mÃ¡s colores pero no tengo problema. Y sobre la Ã‘, hay que cambiar el teclado en el sistema, no es difÃ­cil y de hecho, te acostumbras muy fÃ¡cil, olvidando que no la contiene.Materiales: no tengo problema con esto, pero los materiales de construcciÃ³n se sienten ligeros.Pantalla: tiene muy poco brillo, colores muy opacos O levemente distorsionado, (te podrÃ­a causar problemas si te dedicas al diseÃ±o o el dibujo, pero para el gaming no se nota)Almacenamiento: su almacenamiento es MUY limitado, con pocos juegos se te llenarÃ¡ y es casi obligatorio comprar una SSD de expansiÃ³n o tener buen control de tus apps.Conclusion:Me encanta y no me cansarÃ© nunca de ella, apesar de sus defectos, estoy muy feliz por el precio econÃ³mico y los beneficios que me ha brindado en casi un aÃ±o de uso continuo.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Missing Office Activation but seller worked with me
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I am overall pleased with this laptop. Like others, mine was missing the activated MS Office 2025 lifetime. It was installed but missing the product key. I was able to contact the seller. It is an option if you look at your ordered laptop. The seller was easy to work with. They did not have a product key for the 2025 Office edition but gave me an activation key for Office 2021 lifetime software. They should change the way the laptop is listed because the permanent Office software was definitely one of the selling points for me. I waited to write a review on this production until it was resolved with the seller. The laptop runs smoothly and otherwise is just as it was described.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Pick the join domain option during Windows Setup
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Ordered on April 11th, received on April 12th.  I had an option to join a domain when Windows setup ran.  That's a sign the OS is probably a Pro version.  I used the join domain to bypass the Microsoft account signup.  I did not have to enter an actual domain name.  winver confirmed that laptop is running Windows 11 Pro.  I doubt the machine is running a licensed copy of MS Office Pro.  Seems to want a license for activation.  I substracted 2 stars from my rating for the MS Office confusion.

features: Business professionals can streamline their productivity with the robust and powerful Dell 15.6" Latitude 3550 Laptop. At the heart of the Latitude is an 13th Gen Intel Core i5-1335U processor, 10C (2P + 8E) / 12T, P-core 1.3 / 4.6GHz, E-core 0.9 / 3.4GHz, 12MB, makes it easy to conduct your essential daily tasks at the office, at home, and anywhere else between. Business users can manage complex workloads by sending the right task to the right engine at the right time.

View your work and media on the 15.6" FHD (1920 x 1080) anti-glare Non-Touch, 250nit Display, and integrated Intel Iris Xe graphics. Enjoy quality video meetings with the Full HD webcam, dual array microphones, and stereo speakers. Use a headset with the 3.5mm audio jack or pair the system with a Bluetooth device for added privacy.

With 32GB DDR5 RAM, you can experience quick multitasking performance and render speeds while the 1TB M.2 PCIe NVMe SSD offers ample room for your documents and decreases the load times of your applications. Upgrade for Dell Latitude 3540, Dell 15.6" Latitude 3550 fits into many different environments with ease, and is ideal for school, university, business, studio, and workplace settings.

Connect to your network wired or wirelessly with a built-in Gigabit Ethernet RJ45 port and Wi-Fi 6 AX201, 2x2, Bluetooth 5.3 respectively. Connect a variety of devices to the Latitude with an array of ports including 1 USB 4 Gen 2 Type-C with Power Deli-very & DisplayPort, 1 USB 3.2 Gen1 with PowerShare, 1 HDMI 1.4 port, 1 universal audio port, 2 USB 3.2 Gen1, 1 RJ-45 Ethernet port.

Operating System: Windows 11 Professional English (64-bit). Boasting a powerful processor, immersive display, upgraded performance, and advanced wireless technology, it stands as an ideal choice for business tasks, academic endeavors, and everything in between. Bundled with vent-hear Cable.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Latitude 3550 15 
Essential performance for any business 
Maximum productivity: 13th Gen Intel Core processors offer businesses the performance to create high-end content and run your day-to-day business applications. 
Next-level computing: Available on systems with 13th Gen Intel Core processors, enable optimized power efficiency and be ready to handle the next generation of AI workloads that businesses require to stay ahead of the game.
Time saver: Effortlessly jumpstart your workflow with the Copilot Hardware Key on your device, saving you time by providing quick access to the tools you need to start your workday.
Intelligent collaboration: Users enjoy smoother collaboration with AI-boosts that make Windows Studio Effects even better, with features like smart framing and noise suppression that donâ€™t impact overall system performance.
Lightning-speed: Fast response time and improved performance with up to 64GB DDR5 upgradable memory.
Modern design to boost productivity 
Sleek design: Latitude 3550 is a small laptop that comes in a soft charcoal color with a refined texture for a modern look.â€‹â€‹
Built for productivity: Premium-feel keyboard with durable, laser-etched key prints delivers long key travel for enhanced comfort.
Comfortable touch: The clickpad has a glass-like feel that provides a more comfortable experience.
Experience uncompromised connectivity 
High-speed connections: Available Wi-Fi 6E ensures youâ€™re always connected at the industryâ€™s fastest speeds.
Productivity anywhere: Network Optimization joins the best available network, prioritizes conferencing apps and delivers fast data and video downloads with the world's first simultaneous multi-network connection.
Created for combining forces 
Crystal clear audio: Intelligent audio removes background noise on both ends of the call, while Dynamic Volume adjusts your PC speaker volume so you can hear your call clearly over unexpected noises.
Look your best: Choose between multiple camera options up to FHD+IR, now with HDR technology and TNR4.
Industry-leading AI. Powerful cybersecurity. Designed for business. 
AI-powered multi-tasking mastery for a new way of working with Windows 11 Pro. With features like Copilot in Windows, get better answers, grow your skills, and effortlessly optimize workflows. Windows 11 Pro on Dell PCs come with the latest advances in security and AI delivered conveniently to your desktop. Benefit from AI-enhanced efficiency, performance, and security today, and innovate to take on new challenges tomorrow.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find this laptop to be of good quality, with one noting its crisp and clear screen. They appreciate its functionality, with one mentioning it meets their home use needs, and find it easy to set up, with one customer successfully installing critical Windows 10 software. Customers praise its memory capacity, particularly the 32GB of memory, and its speed, describing it as blazingly fast.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: It's a nice laptop. I'm happy with it.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 23, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Gave the Dell Latitude as a gift. The person that received the computer was and still is happy with it.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This is a nice little laptop for when you're travelling, which is why I purchased it.  Good price and quick delivery; free support for a while (forgot how long).  No issues when starting it up for the first time, just the regular annoying Windows quirks; seemed that you had to have a Microsoft email account already set up, because I was unable to configure one by following the prompts on the install.  But we all know about MS issues.  No problems getting my critical Windows 10 software installed.  I gave up on getting the MS tools (like Outlook, Excel, Word) re-installed, because of all the license junk they add on to make it impossible (let's just call it "Bill's revenge," ok?  Instead, I used Thunderbird for email (wow!!!!), and Google for the docs.  Way less of a pain.Crisp and clear screen -- really amazing.  Great SSD storage size, and very light.  Haven't tried to use unplugged for an afternoon, but I'm supposing it'll function.  Keyboard is kind of ok; fine for travelling, but not sure about using 24x7.  Blazingly fast, and 32GB of memory is awesome.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Head and Shoulders Above Any Laptop I've had in 20 Years
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I am delighted with this product. The ease and comfort of set up shocked me in its simplicity. The connectivity is so precise that I hardly had to lift a finger in order to load - and instantly use - the programs, software and apps I use regularly. The machine simply went out and transferred the connections that had been in place in my previous machine, once it had securely verified and confirmed my identity and the validity of my access. When I think of the old days of installing this, that and the other...In addition, the speed of operation, the storage capacity and system stability are a dream come true. I only regret having waited as long as I did to upgrade machines.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: This is the worst computer.  Do not order this computer.  Only had the computer for one month.  Have issues  with the screen freezing on three separate occasions.  The last time it happened i was not able to get the machine to work for one week.  The LDC screen needs to be replaced and parts ordered.  Worst purchase i have made on Amazon.  I ordered a Dell 3550 and they sent a Dell 3540.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: So far the computer is nice and functions well. I was frustrated with the set up as I wasn't able to say no to the security settings up front. I'm also bummed that its not a touch screen and the keys don't light up.

aPlusContent.title: Product Description
aPlusContent.rawText:
Product Description
Powerful Processor 
N6000 processors deliver amazing performance value. Experience next level performance, including fast web browsing and mainstream productivity performance. 
See more, do more 
The 1920 x 1080 resolution boasts impressive color and clarity. Energy-efficient LED backlight. A cleverly designed 180Â°lay-flat hinge makes it easy to share content or collaborate with friends. The innovative thin-bezel display provides more usable onscreen space for immersive viewing. It also enables a larger screen to fit into a smaller chassis, giving you a laptop with a more compact footprint. 
Get it done, anywhere 
With the compact and lightweight laptop, productivity is always within reach. It easily slips into your backpack or small bag so you can get schoolwork done or create content wherever you are. 
Long Battery Life 
Laptop start up in under 10 seconds. And with up to 10 hours of battery life* and automatic updates, you can get things done without disruptions.(*Battery life may vary based on device and upon usage and other conditions 
Ports & Slots 
1 x HDMI 1.4 
1 x USB-A 2.0 
1 x USB-A 3.2 
1 x USB-C 
1 x Media Card Reader
1 x Headphone Jack
Reinventing the touchpad 
The NumberPad makes number-crunching a whole lot easier. Everything you need from a physical keypad is printed on the touchpad, simply tap the icon to turn it on.

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the laptop works great and consider it good value for money. However, they report issues with scratches to the chassis.

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: True to the description, laptop works fine and worth the prize. Good for on schools and business16gb of ram250gb of disk spaceWindows 10pro11th gen Intel I7 processor
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Don't buy from this seller. Bought this for my son but the Surface laptop came not factory reset. It had previously been set up for an organization called VillageMD so it was prompting for a login tied to the organization. Called Amazon who connected us to Microsoft, Microsoft rep walked us through a reset that went out to the cloud to download but after it was done after 1 hour, still got the prompt to login to this organization. I'm not sure who is at fault here, the seller or Amazon who shipped it but I'm extremely angry with both, more so with Amazon because they shipped it and bear some responsibility. Moreover, the laptop was not in the excellent condition that Amazon promised. There are smudge marks clearly showing that it wasnâ€™t even cleaned up.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on August 18, 2022

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Everything about this listing is misleading.First, this device came with Windows 10, not Windows 11.Second, while I understand that this is reconditioned, the received device still had screen/lid protectors on, food stains on the keyboard, and scratches to the chassis.Third, the keyboard keys are heavily worn, and the T key is functionally unusable.  It sticks, and typically does not acknowledge key presses.  This alone should have disqualified the device from "Reconditioned - Excellent".Fourth, the quoted battery time is for the product is from when it was new.  I promise you will not get the stated battery life because this is a heavily used product, so the battery life will not be anywhere near as good.Whomever is doing the reconditioning isn't even going through the motions of actually checking the device.  Testing, cleanup and reconditioning are not being done at all on these devices, so it is only in as good a condition as the previous owner left it.This is a risky purchase and should be treated like an auction purchase from someone with no feedback.  Sure, you could get a fully functional product in very good shape for a great price, but you could also get a trashed, non-functioning item or anything in between...the quality control is that poor.I honestly don't know how or why Amazon puts their name to this kind of "refurbished" product.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on October 30, 2024

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Wow what a deal. I was skeptical at first but glad I made the purchase. I must say this is a trusted Amazon reseller. There are no scratches, dings or imperfections on this laptop. This is by far one of the best laptops out there. Sure there's newer models but the specs on this unit are great. I did a lot of research and watched many YouTube videos.  I have a Surface Pro 4 which served me well for many years, but hands down this unit blows it away. I paid $1000.00 for it new. I would buy from Amazon & this seller again.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2024

aiReviewsSummary.text: Customers find the laptop easy to set up and use, appreciate its appearance, and consider it decent for its price. However, the build quality receives mixed feedback, with some reporting it broke within months of use. Moreover, the functionality is inconsistent, with some units working well while others fail intermittently. Additionally, the speed receives criticism for being slow, and the battery life is poor as it won't hold a charge.

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: Great value for our needs, simple & easy
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Everything seems to be great with this laptop.  Typical / routine set up - midlevel effort.  I see how the older we get the more unsure the process can feel LOL.  Using for basic purposes.  Mostly email & volunteer work/forms. Great value for our needs
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Laptop was securely packaged and upon opening was easy to setup. Laptop came with one year of Microsoft 365. The AI works awesomely for functionality. Would recommend it for anyone looking for a laptop
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: 10 months later and I love my Lenovo! It's a cheap version of the great Lenovo, basically. You get used to the slower speed after awhile and then everything works like a charm and you only paid 300ish for a great laptop that does everything except play games. Don't get this if you want to play games. Everything else it's great!
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Purchased this as a Christmas gift.  Computer did not perform as expected and was extremely slow and/or would freeze.  Had issues installing Microsoft appsâ€” install would stall and not complete.  When apps ran they would lag.Tried to join a teams call for my childâ€¦ opened teams an hour before the call to make sure everything would would load and it seemed fine.  Fifteen minutes before the call, opened teams to enter the call details.  Camera was not loading and preventing me from joining the call as the teams app froze during the process.  Finally, just as the call was supposed to start, I was able to get into the call.  However, despite making sure I was not on mute and camera was toggled on ( I have been using teams for business calls on a daily basis for the past 3 years, so Iâ€™m super familiar with it).  Person on the line could not see our hear us.  I couldnâ€™t even close the app to try and reconnect. I ended up having to use my cellphone, which connected quickly with no issue. About 30 min after I initially started logging on for the call, I finally had to close the app through the task manager.A brand new computer with these specs should not struggle like this.  My 5 year old laptop should not perform better than this laptop.  I ended up returning the computer.  Paid $350 for the computer and had to pay $65 restocking fee, which is ridiculous for something that was defective out of the box.I will never buy an item like this off Amazon.  Ended up buying a similar laptop through Costco knowing they stand by the products they sell and will refund or replace and item at no charge if it is within the return window if it is defective.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewDescription: Works for our purposes.
productPageReviews.reviewedIn: Reviewed in the United States on April 19, 2025

productPageReviews.reviewTitle: product is as described and works fine
productPageReviews.reviewDescription: I've been using it a couple months now and everything's good. I chose Lenovo brand because I'd already bought an upper tier Lenovo a couple years earlier and that one has been super. This time I'm getting a lower cost model because I thought it would be fine as a "TV companion" meaning I have it on a TV stand in my bedroom to do occasional tasks or even watch some things on the TV via HDMI. It seems to get bogged down a bit with lots of Chrome windows open or running youtubeTV. So maybe I needed a stronger device. Either way I don't think I should knock my rating of it for my own choice because under 340 for a top brand laptop has been a good deal.
